summary.value: The ship has a spirit of her own, and this is the best place to listen to her.

data.haunt:
If the Hauntee has a Bond with the Stardust, they may choose one of the following for each emotion in that Bond: resistance to bolt, resistance to fire, and resistance to light.

If they do not, they take @DMG[5 bolt] damage at the start of their turn. If they have multiple turns in a round, the second is @DMG[5 fire] damage, then @DMG[5 light] damage, then no more until the next round.

data.ritual: Move fast, burn brightly, and resist hostile environments.
